game.body.staticstructs.ground.hauntedForest.HauntedFlatPlatform
public class HauntedFlatPlatform extends GroundFrame
A platform which uses the HauntedForest tile set.

  • Constructor Details

    • HauntedFlatPlatform

      public HauntedFlatPlatform(GameWorld gameWorld, float x, float y, int lengthScale)
      Constructor for HauntedFlatPlatform.
      Creates a new instance of HauntedFlatPlatform with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      gameWorld - the game world
      x - the x-coordinate of the platform
      y - the y-coordinate of the platform
      lengthScale - the length scale of the platform (must be >= 1)
      Throws:
      IllegalLengthScaleException - if lengthScale is less than 1
